PROJECT_DESCRIPTION: This project is a sample Angular application built with Angular 16+ and Angular Material...

PROJECT_DESCRIPTION: This project is a sample Angular application built with Angular 16+ and Angular Material. It showcases a crew management system with features like multilingual support, crew listing, detailed views, modals, and more.
A_LANGUAGE_SELECTOR: A Language Selector is available on the top-right corner of the homepage.
SUPPORTED_LANGUAGES: Supported languages; ðŸ‡¬ðŸ‡§ English ðŸ‡«ðŸ‡· French ðŸ‡µðŸ‡¹ Portuguese
DYNAMIC_LABELS: All labels and table headers dynamically change based on the selected language.
CREW_LIST_DETAILS: A data grid displays the list of crew members with the following details:
CREW_DETAILS_FIELDS: First Name, Last Name, Nationality, Title, Days On Board, Daily Rate, Currency, and Total Income.
ACTION_MENU: Action Menu: Edit, Delete, and View options.
CARD_PAGE_LINK: Card Page Link: Redirects to the Crew Card Page.
DELETE_CREW: Delete Crew: Removes the crew from the list.
TOTAL_INCOME_DISPLAY: Displays the total income per currency at the bottom of the grid.
CREW_CARD_DETAILS: Detailed information about a crew member presented in two tabs:
CARD_TAB_DETAILS: Card Tab: First Name, Last Name, Nationality, Title, Days On Board, Daily Rate, Currency, and Total Income.
CERTIFICATES_TAB_DETAILS: Certificates Tab: Lists all certificates owned by the crew with full details.
ADD_CREW_POPUP: A popup allows adding a new crew member. The new crew member appears in the list upon saving.
CERTIFICATE_TYPE_DESCRIPTION: A dedicated page for adding certificate types.
DISCOUNT_COLUMN_FEATURE: Discount Column: Input field to apply a discount on Total Income. Automatically updates the row and total income summary.
DARK_MODE_LIGHT_MODE: Supports both Dark Mode and Light Mode for an enhanced user experience.
CONTACT_DESCRIPTION: Thank you for taking the time to review this project. Your feedback is invaluable in helping me improve and refine my skills. Please don't hesitate to reach out through the channels below to share your thoughts.
